name: Agent Cade
description:
a Short prototype that was made for the Mini Jam 104: Cascade.

You are playing as Agent Cade, an Agent who just got hired. On his first day Cade while panicking, tries to shoot an alien that he just found, and the gun jammed, and then he ran down the streets to escape the alien, but the alien followed him. in the end Cade must shoot the alien before they get to him.

shoot the alien while also dodging the barrels.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows to move the aim cursor.
  • AD/Left Arrow Right Arrow to move Cade.
  • Shift to enter Aim Mode.
  • Space/Enter to shoot while in Aim mode.
